    Interface MemorySnapshotInterface

    Interface for memory snapshot initialization. Represents a complete state of agent memory at a point in time.

    interface MemorySnapshotInterface {
        flashMemory?: FlashMemoryInterface;
        longTermMemory?: LongTermMemoryInterface;
        rollingSummary?: RollingSummaryInterface;
    }
